muff.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a short tube of thick cloth or fur that you can put your hands into to keep them warm in cold weather
muff.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to spoil a chance to do something well or achieve something
muff.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: You’ll probably only get one chance to take a photo, so don’t muff it!
muff.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: to fail to catch a ball or kick it properly in a game or sport
muff.translation[1].definitions[1].examp: With only the goalkeeper to beat, he completely muffed his shot.
